effective_date.label: Effective Date
effective_date.description: The date when the agreement becomes effective

party_a_name.label: Party A Name
party_a_name.description: Full legal name of the first party

party_a_title.label: Party A Title/Company
party_a_title.description: Title or company name for Party A

party_a_signatory_name.label: Party A Signatory Name
party_a_signatory_name.description: Name of person signing for Party A

party_b_name.label: Party B Name
party_b_name.description: Full legal name of the second party

party_b_title.label: Party B Title/Company
party_b_title.description: Title or company name for Party B

party_b_signatory_name.label: Party B Signatory Name
party_b_signatory_name.description: Name of person signing for Party B

docName.label: Purpose/Topic
docName.description: The topic or purpose of the confidential information (e.g., 'Project Alpha', 'Investment Opportunity')

term_months.label: Agreement Term (months)
term_months.description: Duration of the agreement in months

confidentiality_period_months.label: Confidentiality Period (months)
confidentiality_period_months.description: How long information must remain confidential after termination

governing_law.label: Governing Law
governing_law.description: State or jurisdiction whose laws will govern the agreement

ip_ownership.label: IP Ownership Terms
ip_ownership.description: Optional: Specific terms about intellectual property ownership

non_solicit.label: Non-Solicitation Terms
non_solicit.description: Optional: Terms preventing solicitation of employees or clients

exclusivity.label: Exclusivity Terms
exclusivity.description: Optional: Terms about exclusive dealings between parties
